text: Cecilie Paus (born 1943), née Wilhelmsen, is a Norwegian businesswoman in the shipping industry, who lives in London. She has been one of the four main owners of the shipping company Wilh. Wilhelmsen since 1978 together with her three siblings.Wilhelmsen og Wallenius vil danne shippingkjempe, Vestviken 24 She is a daughter of the shipping magnate Tom Wilhelmsen and is married to the businessman Christopher Paus. She is the mother of four children, among them daughters Olympia and Pontine Paus, a noted designer.Pontine Paus is the hottest new name in handbags, Vogue ==References== Category:Norwegian businesspeople in shipping Category:Wilhelmsen family Cecilie Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:People from Oslo Category:Norwegian women in business
title: Cecilie Paus
